014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
017import java.util.Objects;
018import java.util.Set;
019
020public class DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry implements AutoCloseableRegistry {
021
022  // @GuardedBy("this")
023  private Set<AutoCloseable> closeables;
024
025  public DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry() {
026    super();
027  }
028
029  @Override // Cloneable
030  public DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry clone() {
031    final DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry dacr;
032    try {
033      dacr = (DefaultAutoCloseableRegistry)super.clone();
034    } catch (final CloneNotSupportedException e) {
035      throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
036    }
037    dacr.closeables = null;
038    this.register(dacr); // critical
039    return dacr;
040  }
041
042  @Override // AutoCloseableRegistry
043  public final void close() {
044    final Set<? extends AutoCloseable> closeables;
045    synchronized (this) {
046      closeables = this.closeables;
047      if (closeables == null) {
048        this.closeables = Set.of(); // prevent registrations
049        return;
050      } else if (this.closed()) {
051        return;
052      }
053      this.closeables = Set.of(); // prevent recursion; causes closed() to return true
054    }
055    RuntimeException re = null;
056    for (final AutoCloseable c : closeables) {
057      try {
058        c.close();
059      } catch (final RuntimeException e) {
060        if (re == null) {
061          re = e;
062        } else {
063          re.addSuppressed(e);
064        }
065      } catch (final Exception e) {
066        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
067          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
068        }
069        if (re == null) {
070          re = new BeanException(e.getMessage(), e);
071        } else {
072          re.addSuppressed(e);
073        }
074      }
075    }
076    if (re != null) {
077      throw re;
078    }
079  }
080
081  @Override // AutoCloseable
082  public final synchronized boolean closed() {
083    return this.closeables == Set.<AutoCloseable>of();
084  }
085
086  @Override // AutoCloseableRegistry
087  public final boolean register(final AutoCloseable closeable) {
088    if (Objects.requireNonNull(closeable, "closeable") == this) {
089      throw new IllegalArgumentException("closeable == this");
090    }
091    synchronized (this) {
092      if (this.closeables == null) {
093        this.closeables = new LinkedHashSet<>();
094      }
095      return !this.closed() && this.closeables.add(closeable);
096    }
097  }
098
099  public final synchronized int size() {
100    return this.closeables == null ? 0 : this.closeables.size();
101  }
102
103}
